body:
Comment 2: 
$GOPATH is a list of directories with specific structure.
In particular, for each d in $GOPATH,
the package sources live in $d/src, so an import "foo/bar"
looks in $d/src/foo/bar.

The -path argument to godoc has different semantics,
targeting a different use.

godoc should be updated to treat $GOPATH as its own
thing, not as a synonym for -path.
